question.xref: DES s1, DES s11, HC r91
question.text: You’re planning a long journey. Do you need to plan rest stops?

explanation.text: Try to plan your journey so that you can take rest stops. It’s recommended that you take a break of at least 15 minutes after every two hours of driving or riding. This should help to maintain your concentration.

answer.text: Yes, you should plan to stop every half an hour
No, you’ll be less tired if you get there as soon as possible
No, only fuel stops will be needed
